name: Soccer League Star: Kick Ball
description:
If you like soccer games this is your game! Download it now, defend your nation and show to the world who is the best soccer player ever.

Challenge your friends and have tons of fun beating them. Play with your favorite team in this subbuteo-style game.

Just steal the ball from your rival, go to the penalty area and score goals as only the best strikers do.


◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- Multiplayer game
- Two player mode
- Tournaments and single player matches
- Unlock up to 32 different teams and multiples formations
- Fun gameplay
- Easy to play


◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Choose the game mode.
- Choose your team, its formation and the duration of the match
- Flick the ball with the caps to score goals.


◉ TIPS ◉

When you lose a match, never give up. “The harder the victory, the greater the happiness of winning” said by Pele.


Have fun downloading this soccer cap game and score as many goals as you can

Do not forget to give us a positive review!
